page.title: 03Leisure and Recreation
page.content: 1 A LEISURE ACTIVITY IS WALKING THROUGH THE WOODS, AS ITS SO PEACEFUL AND PLEASANT. 2 LOTS OF YOUNG AND OLD CHILDREN KEEP PONIES AS THERES NO FACILITIES LIKE SWIMMING. 3 AT THE TOP OF ELLWOOD THERE IS A FOOTBALL CLUB FOR PEOPLE TO GO AND ENJOY A SATURDAY OR SUNDAY AFTERNOON WATCHING FOOTBALL. 4 MOST CHILDREN HAVE BIKES OR GO/CARTS TO OCCUPLY THEM IN THE HOLIDAY. 5 A LOT OF BOYS HAVE MOTOR BIKES TO RIDE ON IN THE WOODS AS THEY HAVE NOTHING ELSE TO DO. 6 PEOPLE GET INTRESTED IN BIRDS, SO THEY BIRDWATCH IN THE WOODS TO SEE THE DIFFERENT BIRDS. 7 IN SLING THERE IS A SOCIAL CLUB FOR ANYONE TO GO TO.
